app.title: Vital Balance Pro - Advanced Comparison

app.createdBy: RhythmVital Pro • Created by Victor M.F. Avilan

people.title: People Management
people.noPeopleDescription: Add people to start comparing their biorhythms
people.name: Name
people.maxPeopleDescription: You can compare up to 3 people simultaneously

details.title: Individual Details
details.description: Complete information of all cycles for each active person

comparison.title: Biorhythm Comparison (31 days)
comparison.description: 15 days before and 15 days after the selected date.
comparison.noPeopleToCompareDescription: Add at least 2 people in the "People" tab to start comparison
comparison.needMorePeopleDescription: Add at least one more person to make comparisons
